data.title: IBM Quantum Hub at the University of Melbourne
data.meta_description: The IBM Quantum Hub at the University of Melbourne offers a complete approach for Members to gain early entry into quantum computing with the support of deep research expertise and the global quantum community.
data.meta_site_name: IBM Quantum Hub at The University of Melbourne
data.text:
